thread.title: 'Avatar' to get comic book treatment

title: 'Avatar' to get comic book treatment
text: 'Avatar' to get comic book treatment Saturday, 10 October 2015 (8 minutes ago) New York, Oct 10 : Director James Cameron and his team are now planning to expand their "Avatar" franchise through the comic book format. Comic Con Now More Than Just a Convention, It's an Inspiration 01:08 When people think of comic book conventions, they tend to envision throngs of superhero enthusiasts, cosplayers, and collectors swarming the halls of convention centers. By and large, that’s pretty accurate, but according to professors at New York’s Pratt Institute, New York Comic Con is also...
